attributes.action: Save bbc 3 or cancel licence fee
attributes.additional_details: The bbc are planning on moving bbc 3 to an online only service. Myself like many others only view bbc3 and no other bbc service. If this service is removed from the air, I along with millions of other will no longer enjoy a bbc service! Why should we pay for a service that we do not use!

rejection.details: This is an operational matter for the BBC.
